Welcome to Handsy
Made with passion, this app aims to become a reliable reference for learning Filipino Sign Language. We hope you enjoy this as much as I did during its development.
Start Your Journey
Make a fist with your thumb touching the side of your index finger. Hold your hand in front of your chest, palm facing inward.
Extend your fingers and thumb and touch them together. Hold your hand in front of your chest, palm facing outward.
Curve your fingers and thumb to form a C shape. Hold your hand in front of your chest, palm facing outward.
Extend your index finger and curl your other fingers and thumb. Hold your hand in front of your chest, palm facing inward.
Curl your fingers and thumb to touch the palm of your hand. Hold your hand in front of your chest, palm facing inward.
Extend your index finger and thumb and touch their tips together. Curl your other fingers to the palm of your hand. Hold your hand in front of your chest, palm facing inward.
Extend your index finger and thumb and point them downward. Curl your other fingers to the palm of your hand. Hold your hand in front of your chest, palm facing inward.
Extend your index and middle fingers and point them upward. Curl your other fingers and thumb to the palm of your hand. Hold your hand in front of your chest, palm facing inward.
Extend your pinky finger and curl your other fingers and thumb to the palm of your hand. Hold your hand in front of your chest, palm facing inward.

Extend your pinky finger and curl your other fingers and thumb to the palm of your hand. Hold your hand in front of your chest, palm facing inward. Then, trace a J shape in the air with your pinky finger.
Extend your index and middle fingers and spread them apart. Curl your other fingers and thumb to the palm of your hand. Hold your hand in front of your chest, palm facing inward.
Extend your index finger and thumb and touch them together. Curl your other fingers to the palm of your hand. Hold your hand in front of your chest, palm facing outward.
Extend your thumb and touch it to the palm of your hand. Curl your index, middle, and ring fingers over your thumb. Hold your hand in front of your chest, palm facing inward.
Extend your thumb and touch it to the palm of your hand. Curl your index and middle fingers over your thumb. Hold your hand in front of your chest, palm facing inward.
Make a circle with your fingers and thumb. Hold your hand in front of your chest, palm facing outward.
Extend your index and middle fingers and point them downward. Curl your other fingers and thumb to the palm of your hand. Hold your hand in front of your chest, palm facing outward.
Extend your index finger and thumb and point them downward. Curl your other fingers to the palm of your hand. Hold your hand in front of your chest, palm facing inward.
Cross your index and middle fingers. Curl your other fingers and thumb to the palm of your hand. Hold your hand in front of your chest, palm facing outward.
Make a fist with your thumb across your fingers. Hold your hand in front of your chest, palm facing inward.
Extend your thumb and touch it to the palm of your hand. Curl your other fingers over your thumb. Hold your hand in front of your chest, palm facing inward.
Extend your index and middle fingers and point them upward. Curl your other fingers and thumb to the palm of your hand. Hold your hand in front of your chest, palm facing outward.
Extend your index and middle fingers and spread them apart. Curl your other fingers and thumb to the palm of your hand. Hold your hand in front of your chest, palm facing outward.
Extend your index, middle, and ring fingers and spread them apart. Curl your pinky finger and thumb to the palm of your hand. Hold your hand in front of your chest, palm facing outward.
Curl your index finger and point it downward. Curl your other fingers and thumb to the palm of your hand. Hold your hand in front of your chest, palm facing inward.
Extend your thumb and pinky finger and spread them apart. Curl your other fingers to the palm of your hand. Hold your hand in front of your chest, palm facing outward.
Extend your index finger and point it upward. Hold your hand in front of your chest, palm facing inward. Then, trace a Z shape in the air with your index finger.

First, sign “what” by pointing your index finger upward and moving it slightly from side to side. Hold your hand in front of your chest, palm facing inward. Second, sign “name” by tapping your index and middle fingers on your opposite palm twice. Hold your hands in front of your chest, palms facing each other. Third, sign “you” by pointing your index finger at the person you are talking to. Hold your hand in front of your chest, palm facing outward.
